name: react-native-global-styler
description: A lightweight and developer-friendly styling toolkit for React Native. It includes prebuilt styled components and a powerful `useGlobalStyler` hook to apply consistent, scalable styles using shorthand props like `m_10`, `radius_12`, `resize_cover` in componet props, and more
author: Danyil <daniyil.antoniuk@gmail.com> (https://danyil.net)
